description: Factor 2n+1 = (2^m1)*(3^m2)*(5^m3)*...; a(n) = number of initial zero exponents.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: A038802 := proc(n) numtheory[factorset](2*n+1) ; min(%); numtheory[pi](%)-1 ; end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 01 2011
mathematica: Table[f = FactorInteger[2 n + 1]; PrimePi[f[[1, 1]]] - 1, {n, 100}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Apr 23 2013 *)
author: _Thomas Kellar_
extensions: a(69) corrected by _Rick G. Rosner_, Apr 22 2013
